title: Crusader Kings 2 - EU4 Converter DLC
description:
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Make sure your game is updated to 1.11 (can download from official paradox site no drm included)place the dlc folder with all the files in it into your install  directory overwrite where asked place the activator in your install directory and run it game will appear to start but will crash 
somewhere around loading family flags or something like that this is normal. now launch game through game launcher like normal un-click all DLC then re-click them then launch game should have all enabled. if for some reason they are not working (and you will know by bottom left corner of starting map there will be little icons that say which dlc activated)
run the activator a few more times and then try launching the game again..... thanks goes to others im just passing it on...
If it still will not work, try going into  Documents and Settings Username  Documents  Paradox Interactive  Crusader Kings II " ,
then delete the gfx and dlc_signature; only the savegames folder and the file settings.txt should remain inside and then try to use the activator again 

(If starting from scratch i found the easiest being skidrows ck2 release followed by update2 from skidrow then using the official patch after that)

NOTE: This release includes updated versions of some of the older DLC not sure exactly which ones I do not remember but because of this MAKE SURE you replace ALL of your dlc
with what is in the folder.... Also please seed i will only seed this for a day or two and that is it....

ALL THANKS GOES TO HUMANERROR FROM tehparadox And El Marto, Angelo from http://alfas.freeforums.org/

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Start CK2 >Load save > Press esc > Export game 


Cheers!
